text: Va ʙe tardid, ʙisjore az cinnijon va odamijonro ʙaroi duzax ofaridaem, [caro ki] dilhoe dorand, ki ʙo onho [haqoiqro] dark namekunand va casmone dorand, ki ʙo onho [nisonahoi tavonu tadʙiri ilohiro] nameʙinand va gushoe dorand, ki ʙo onho [suxanoni haqro] namesunavand. Onon hamcun cahorpojonand, ʙalki [az onho ham] gumrohtarand. [Ore] Ononand,ki [az oxirat] ƣofiland
